Text:
I'm already kaking myself about the casualty list come the WC. It's only week 2 and Juan is out for the season...

*SIGH*
All hail the mighty Shemaza, saviour of the oppressed and giver of Rugby to those whose wives will not allow it!  All hail!
@dyemiller: Bless you my son, go forth into the world and score some tries :)

You rule bru. Since the demise of rugbyzone it's like living in a rugby desert up here. Thank you very very very much. The only difficult thing is trying to avoid hearing the results before I watch - no checking facebook or emails before Tuesday;-)
Shemyaza saved us.  Without Shemyaza, we were lost.
Ta buddy for this. Great work and effort. With the demise of Kuduclub, any any assistance with getting Binneland, and other TV shows to us. We will help seed.......

shemyaza, I registered just so I could comment: THANK YOU! I started following rugby last year after catching the Six Nations on BBC America, and thanks to you became a big fan of Super Rugby. You are a hero!
Shemyaza, thank you.... i hope you know we really appreciate it.
